content.rendered:
Non-Clinical Healthcare Jobs

Where Healthcare Meets Management – Making a Difference Every Day.

What are non-clinical careers in healthcare?

Non-clinical jobs in the healthcare field are a critical part of the medical system. The importance of non-clinical jobs in healthcare is often overlooked, but those working in non-clinical positions play a vital part in helping hospitals and other medical facilities run efficiently so that the clinical staff can focus on providing the best care for patients. 

Lifelink Healthcare Staffing provides non-clinical professionals exciting career opportunities at top healthcare organizations nationwide. With multiple employment options available including contract work, temp to perm opportunities, and direct hire jobs, our dedicated recruiters can help you find the perfect non-clinical healthcare job near you!

Learn More

Non-clinical positions typically do not involve direct patient care and usually revolve around anything behind the scenes at hospitals and other healthcare facilities. While some non-clinical jobs are specific to healthcare like hospital executives or medical billers and coders, many jobs in departments like human resources, information technology (IT), and facility maintenance exist in other industries. These non-clinical careers generally do not require prior healthcare experience and are often an excellent way to get into the medical field leading to a rewarding and meaningful career in the medical profession.

Learn More

Explore non-clinical healthcare jobs with Lifelink

The types of non-clinical roles available are as vast as the range of unique requirements and skill sets needed to work in these positions. Our recruiters are experienced with navigating the different backgrounds, certifications, and degrees healthcare facilities require for employment. At Lifelink, we know how important your career is, and we work with you to select the job that meets your needs and utilizes your individual experience.

Learn More

List of non-clinical healthcare jobs

Applying has never been easier!

Meet Frankie

Frankie, Lifelink Healthcare Staffing’s virtual assistant, helps allied health professionals through our application process. Once you click the ‘apply’ button, Frankie will guide you through the application by asking you questions and automatically submitting your information, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

Find Your Dream Travel Nurse Assignment

With our new chat bot, you’ll be able to quickly apply for an allied health job and easily create your profile with Lifelink in a matter of minutes. Our streamlined application process helps experienced allied health professionals find the job of their dreams with Lifelink.

Apply Today

Experience the advantage of working with Lifelink

Our streamlined application process makes onboarding with Lifelink easy

Are you looking for a new job in your healthcare career? Lifelink can assist you in finding a role best suited to your experience and needs. Our easy application process takes minutes to complete and by applying directly, you can eliminate hours spent hunting through job postings. Our experienced recruiters will guide you through the hiring process and help you find your next dream non-clinical job in healthcare. Get started by applying today!

Learn More

Search for non-clinical healthcare jobs on the go with Lifelink's mobile app

Finding jobs near you is now as easy as opening Lifelink Healthcare Staffing’s mobile app. With our app, you can search for new non-clinical job opportunities and save job searches to receive alert notifications  when a new job matches your search criteria. You can also add your schedule availability and instantly book non-clinical shifts when they are available. Try out our mobile app today!

Learn More

24/7 support for when you need it most

Lifelink Healthcare Staffing’s National Service Center provides non-clinical healthcare professionals support any time of the day. We know that working in the healthcare field sometimes requires support after normal business hours; to ensure excellent customer service experience, we make ourselves available at all hours of the day and night – 365 days a year.

Learn More

Earn extra money with Lifelink's employee referral program

Do you know a non-clinical health professional that is looking for a new job opportunity? Refer them to Lifelink! Our referral bonus program is open to employees and non-employees alike. For every referral you make to Lifelink, you have the chance to earn extra money as a reward for helping us find the best talent out there.

 

Refer your friends, family, or colleagues in the healthcare community to Lifelink Healthcare Staffing today!

Learn More

Explore other career opportunities with Lifelink

Lifelink Healthcare Staffing is dedicated to supporting our communities in crisis. For years, we have provided non-clinical and clinical personnel support to government and local state entities to assist with disaster relief efforts, emergency response, staffing shortages, and more. The staffing services we provide are critical for emergency management in cities across the United States. Learn more about our emergency services or search our current job openings to see how you can help.

Learn More

Lifelink Healthtech Referral Program

Help someone find a job and earn rewards in the process.

Refer a Friend

Fill Out the Form

Get Rewards

Let's Discuss
